verses.verse: A Psalm<WH4210> of David.<WH1732> LORD,<WH3068> who<WH4310> shall abide<WH1481> in thy tabernacle?<WH168> who<WH4310> shall dwell<WH7931> in thy holy<WH6944> hill?<WH2022>
He that walketh<WH1980> uprightly,<WH8549> and worketh<WH6466> righteousness,<WH6664> and speaketh<WH1696> the truth<WH571> in his heart.<WH3824>

He that backbiteth<WH7270> not<WH3808> with<WH5921> his tongue,<WH3956> nor<WH3808> doeth<WH6213> evil<WH7451> to his neighbor,<WH7453> nor<WH3808> taketh up<WH5375> a reproach<WH2781> against<WH5921> his neighbor.<WH7138>

In whose eyes<WH5869> a vile person<WH3988> is contemned;<WH959> but he honoreth<WH3513> them that fear<WH3372> the LORD.<WH3068> He that sweareth<WH7650> to his own hurt,<WH7489> and changeth<WH4171> not.<WH3808>

He that putteth not out<WH5414> <WH3808> his money<WH3701> to usury,<WH5392> nor<WH3808> taketh<WH3947> reward<WH7810> against<WH5921> the innocent.<WH5355> He that doeth<WH6213> these<WH428> things shall never<WH3808> <WH5769> be moved.<WH4131>
